comments.body: For this one, I guess we need @gengliangwang 's review since he requested?

IIUC this one is for `InMemoryTable` instead of `FileFormatDataWriter`. Shall we rename the test suite?
As for testing `FileFormatDataWriter`, if it is tricky and difficult, let's mark it as follow up since the code changes in `FileFormatDataWriter.scala` look good.

Ah, right, I was writing tests for custom `FileTable` which uses custom metrics but may copying some duplicated codes for `FileWrite`, etc. So in the end I turned to `InMemoryTable` but forgot that `InMemoryTable` doesn't use `FileWriterFactory`...

I will rename this test suite to `InMemoryTableMetricSuite`.

Let me do a follow up adding tests for `FileTable`. Thanks.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@import org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType

class FileFormatDataWriterMetricSuite
  extends QueryTest with SharedSparkSession with BeforeAndAfter {
  import testImplicits._
